title: Eighty-four delegations support final declaration of Ukraine summit
description: There was no support from the Brics states such as India, Brazil and South Africa.
content:
Eighty-four delegations support final declaration of Ukraine summit
The question of the scope of a follow-up conference is also still difficult to answer. Keystone Pool / Michael Buholzer
